channel.title: Raton|Colfax County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Raton|Colfax County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-64/US-87 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-64/US-87 East to Capulin, Des Moines, and Clayton.

item.title: US-64/US-87 East at I-25 North
item.description: US-64/US-87 East at I-25 north to Trinidad (Colorado).

item.title: I-25 South Exit 451 Offramp at US-64/US-87
item.description: I-25 south Exit 451 Offramp at US-64/US-87. Turn left for US-64/US-87 East; right for US-64 west. This sign for US-64/US-87 in this picture is odd because it is not a standard shield, rather a text based big green sign.

item.title: I-25 South Exit 451 Offramp at US-64/US-87
item.description: I-25 South - Exit 451 Offramp at US-64/US-87. Turn right for Raton via US-64 west; left for Clayton via US-64/US-87 East.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 451
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 451 - US-64/US-87 East/Raton/Clayton.

item.title: I-25 South - Exit 452
item.description: I-25 south approaching Exit 452 - NM-72 East/Raton/Folsom.
